sentences.en: "It's of no great literary merit," he said, almost apologetically.
sentences.cn: “它没多大的文学价值，”他近乎愧疚地说道。

sentences.en: a work of outstanding artistic merit
sentences.cn: 具有杰出艺术价值的作品

sentences.en: Box-office success mattered more than artistic merit.
sentences.cn: 票房上的成功比艺术价值更重要。

sentences.en: Each of these approaches to teaching has its merits .
sentences.cn: 这些教学方法每一种都有其优点。

sentences.en: Everybody is selected on merit.
sentences.cn: 每个人都是凭个人才能入选的。

sentences.en: For his dedication the Mayor awarded him a medal of merit.
sentences.cn: 为表彰他的奉献精神，市长授予他荣誉奖章。

sentences.en: He is a man of merit.
sentences.cn: 他是有功劳的人.

sentences.en: He is modest about his merit.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的优点很谦虚.

sentences.en: He reached his present senior position through sheer merit.
sentences.cn: 他全靠他的功绩才达到今天的地位.

sentences.en: History affords us lessons that merit attention.
sentences.cn: 历史给我们提供了值得注意的借鉴.

sentences.en: It’s a fascinating book which merits attention.
sentences.cn: 这是本引人入胜的书，值得关注。

sentences.en: The argument seemed to have considerable merit.
sentences.cn: 这个论点似乎颇有价值。

sentences.en: The great merit of the project is its flexibility and low cost.
sentences.cn: 该项目最大的优点是它的灵活性和低成本。

sentences.en: The merit of the report is its realistic assessment of the changes required.
sentences.cn: 这份报告的优点就是它对所要求的变动进行了实事求是的评估。

sentences.en: The results have been encouraging enough to merit further investigation.
sentences.cn: 结果令人振奋，值得进一步调查研究。

sentences.en: The subject may merit a brief explanatory note.
sentences.cn: 这题目也许要个简明的注释.

sentences.en: There is great merit in dealing fairly with your employees.
sentences.cn: 公正地对待你的雇员有极大好处.

sentences.en: Those who have gained merit will be rewarded.
sentences.cn: 有功者奖.

sentences.en: Those who perform deeds of merIt'shall be rewarded.
sentences.cn: 立功者受奖.

sentences.en: Tonight’s meeting will weigh up the relative merits of the two candidates.
sentences.cn: 今晚的会议将对两位候选人的相对优点进行考量。

sentences.en: Your feature has the merit of simply stating what has been achieved.
sentences.cn: 你这篇专题文章的可取之处是简明扼要地道出了取得的成就。
